DataElement.preferredName: Short Physical Performance Battery 17 Did Not Attempt 1st Gait Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe other reason than those previously listed to describe reason that participant did not attempt or failed the first gait speed test.

Concepts.longName: Short Physical Performance Battery Version 1.2 Functional Test
Concepts.definition: A standardized five-item 10-minute assessment tool, developed by Guralnik et al. 1994, that is used for the evaluation of lower extremity physical function and consists of three subtests, including standing balance, walking, and rising from a chair.
